name: ESTATES & FUTURE INTERESTS
subject: real_property
rule_statement: Present possessory estates include fee simple absolute, defeasible fees, and life estates; future interests include reversions, remainders, and executory interests that must satisfy RAP.
story_method: Imagine a medieval castle with a king who must decide succession. The KING has present possession (present estate), but he's planning for HEIRS (future interests). Some heirs get the castle automatically (vested), others only if conditions are met (contingent), and some lose it if they break rules (
kinesthetic_gesture: Present Estate: Hold object in hands (you have it now); Future Interest: Point forward (coming later); Vested Remainder: Firm handshake (guaranteed)
ascii_visual:
PRESENT ────────────────► FUTURE
  NOW         CONDITION      LATER
  👑          ❓            👑👑👑
GRANTOR   →   EVENT    →   HEIRS
(has it)     (maybe)      (might get)

micro_hypos.scenario: Grantor conveys "to A for life, then to B."
micro_hypos.answer: A has life estate, B has vested remainder.
micro_hypos.memory_hook: Simple family succession - dad to son

micro_hypos.scenario: Grantor conveys "to A so long as A never marries."
micro_hypos.answer: A has fee simple determinable; grantor retains possibility of reverter.
micro_hypos.memory_hook: Controlling parent - automatic loss if A marries

micro_hypos.scenario: "To A for life, then to A's children."
micro_hypos.answer: A has life estate; children have contingent remainder.
micro_hypos.memory_hook: Kids wait to inherit, but only if they exist

micro_hypos.scenario: "To A for life, then to A's heirs."
micro_hypos.answer: A has life estate; "heirs" creates reversion to grantor.
micro_hypos.memory_hook: "Heirs" is a magic word that means "back to grantor"

pitfalls: AUTO vs. MANUAL: Determinable = AUTOmatic (like autopilot); Condition Subsequent = MANUAL reentry (like manual transmission)
REMAINDER RULE: Remainders are like train passengers - they wait for their turn, never jump ahead (never executory)
RAP TRAP: 21 years + lives in being = drinking age (21) + pregnancy (gestation)

name: CONVEYANCING & RECORDING
subject: real_property
rule_statement: Recording statutes protect bona fide purchasers; race-notice is majority rule, requiring timely recordation without notice of prior interests.
ascii_visual:
🏃‍♂️A ────► 🏛️ COURTHOUSE ◄──── 🏃‍♂️B
BUYER A         RECORDING         BUYER B
(knows nothing) SYSTEM           (saw A's deed)
   ↓                               ↓
  WINS!                          LOSES

micro_hypos.scenario: O conveys to A; A records. O then conveys to BFP who records without notice.
micro_hypos.memory_hook: Honest buyer wins the race to courthouse

micro_hypos.scenario: O conveys to A; A doesn't record. O conveys to B who knows of A's interest.
Warranty deed covenants seisin, quiet enjoyment, warranty, further assurances.
Quitclaim deed transfers "whatever interest I have."

pitfalls: BFP = Good Faith Penny: Bona fide purchaser needs good faith + value (even $1) + no notice
Chain Gang: Must examine entire chain of title, not just immediate grantor (like prison chain gang - all connected)
Triple Notice Threat: Actual (you know) + Constructive (recorded) + Inquiry (should have known)

name: EASEMENTS, SERVITUDES & LICENSES
subject: real_property
rule_statement: Easements create rights to use another's land; appurtenant easements run with land, in gross are personal; licenses are revocable permissions.
kinesthetic_gesture: Actual Notice: 👀 Point to your eyes (you SAW it); Record Notice: 📋 Hold up papers (it's RECORDED); Inquiry Notice: 🤔 Tap your temple (reasonable person would ASK)
ascii_visual:
🎼 DEVELOPER'S MASTER PLAN 🎼
    
Lot 1 → 🏠 (sold early, no deed restrictions)
Lot 2 → 🏠 + 📋 (deed says "residential only")  
Lot 3 → 🏠 + 📋 (deed says "residential only")
Lot 4 → 🏠 + 📋 (deed says "residential only")
...all playing the same song of restrictions...

Question: Can Lot 1 🏠 play a different tune? 🎵🏢
Answer: NO if the buyer had NOTICE of the common scheme! 🚫

micro_hypos.scenario: Developer subdivides 10 lots, sells Lot 1 without restrictions, then sells remaining 9 lots with "residential only" restrictions. Later buyer of Lot 1 opens business.
micro_hypos.answer: If common scheme existed when Lot 1 was sold AND buyer had notice, restrictions bind Lot 1.
micro_hypos.memory_hook: Early bird still caught by the common scheme worm

micro_hypos.scenario: Buyer purchases lot with deed containing no restrictions, but sees "Residential Only" signs throughout subdivision and all neighboring houses are residential.
micro_hypos.answer: Inquiry notice sufficient to bind buyer to common scheme restrictions.
micro_hypos.memory_hook: Signs and patterns give notice - ignorance isn't bliss

micro_hypos.scenario: Developer sells 5 of 10 lots with restrictions, keeps 5 unrestricted for potential commercial use.
micro_hypos.answer: No common scheme because developer didn't intend restrictions on ALL lots.
micro_hypos.memory_hook: Common scheme needs COMMON intent for all lots

name: CONCURRENT OWNERSHIP
subject: real_property
rule_statement: Joint tenancy requires four unities; tenancy in common has no survivorship; tenancy by entirety protects marital property from separate creditors.

name: LANDLORD-TENANT LAW
subject: real_property
rule_statement: Landlord must maintain habitable premises; tenant must pay rent; holdover becomes periodic tenancy; self-help eviction is illegal in most states.

name: MORTGAGES, FORECLOSURE & PRIORITY
subject: real_property
rule_statement: Mortgage creates security interest; foreclosure terminates mortgagor's equity; purchase money mortgages have super-priority over later liens on same collateral.

name: ZONING & TAKINGS
subject: real_property
rule_statement: Zoning regulates land use; takings require just compensation; variance is exception to zoning rules for hardship; exactions must be roughly proportional.

name: ADVERSE POSSESSION
subject: real_property
rule_statement: Hostile, actual, exclusive, continuous possession for statutory period perfects title; color of title reduces period to 7 years.

name: FIXTURES
subject: real_property
rule_statement: Personal property becomes real property when permanently attached with intent to improve the realty; trade fixtures remain personal property.
